text: @DrRPNishank @narendramodi @AmitShah @PMOIndia @HMOIndia @HRDMinistry @mygovindia @transformIndia @PIB_India @MIB_India @DDNewslive Will neet be postponed or not?? We are facing so many problem due to COVID-19 if u conduct exam that will be the last day of our life....our life is more important than exam..bcoz we r studying to provide service for our nation...during this crisis..it may cause death of 10 lakh
